pages.text: Plates are necessary for most later types of items, you will need metal plates. Metal plates are created using a plate press, shown to the right. You will need a decent amount of iron to build it, but it is a necessity for future projects.

The burner press requires a mold to work. Molds can be created using the Flat stamp and Machine template folder. Flat stamps start out without a mold, but you can change the mold using the machine template folder.
To change the Flat stamp mold, you must right click with the Machine template folder. Select the type of mold you want in the material of your flat stamp to create a mold.
